alert.note: Alert for Craven; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 5:30PM EDT until May 09 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CRAVEN AND SOUTHERN PAMLICO COUNTIES... At 528 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Janeiro, or 9 miles east of James City, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 5:01 PM, a trained spotter reported extensive tree debris in Ernul, NC. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Janeiro, Grantsboro, Whortonsville, Riverdale, Nc Pamlico, Merritt, Minnesott Beach Ferry, Fairfield Harbour, Bayboro, Alliance, Arapahoe, Minnesott Beach and Stonewall. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
